title: BPMN 2.0标准工具
description: This is the BPMN 2.0 stencil set specification.

properties.title: Id
properties.description: Unique identifier of the element.

properties.title: 名称(Name)
properties.description: BPMN元素名称

properties.title: 文档(Documentation)
properties.description: BPMN元素描述

properties.title: 流程名称(Process identifier)
properties.description: 流程的特殊唯一的名称标识

properties.title: 流程作者(Process author)
properties.description: 流程定义者姓名

properties.title: 流程版本(Process version string (documentation only))
properties.description: 标识文档版本为目的

properties.title: 目标命名空间(Target namespace)
properties.description: 工作流目标命名空间

properties.title: 表单编号(Form key)
properties.description: 用户任务表单编号

properties.title: 到期日期(Due date)
properties.description: 用户任务到期时间

properties.title: 优先级(Priority)
properties.description: 用户任务优先级

properties.title: 分配用户(Assignments)
properties.description: 分配任务给自动用户

complexItems.name: 资源赋值表达式(Resource assignment expression)
complexItems.description: This defines the expression used for the resource assignment.
complexItems.description_de: Definiert den Ausdruck, der fr die Zordung von Ressourcen genutzt wird.

properties.title: 表单属性(Form properties)
properties.description: 定义表单属性

complexItems.name: Id
complexItems.description: This defines the expression used for the resource assignment.
complexItems.description_de: Definiert den Ausdruck, der fr die Zordung von Ressourcen genutzt wird.

complexItems.name: 名称(Name)
complexItems.description: This defines the expression used for the resource assignment.
complexItems.description_de: Definiert den Ausdruck, der fr die Zordung von Ressourcen genutzt wird.

complexItems.name: 表达式(Expression)
complexItems.description: This defines the expression used for the resource assignment.
complexItems.description_de: Definiert den Ausdruck, der fr die Zordung von Ressourcen genutzt wird.

complexItems.name: 变量(Variable)
complexItems.description: This defines the expression used for the resource assignment.
complexItems.description_de: Definiert den Ausdruck, der fr die Zordung von Ressourcen genutzt wird.

properties.title: 任务监听器(Task listeners)
properties.description: 监听用户任务

properties.title: Class
properties.description: Class that implements the service task logic.

properties.title: Expression
properties.description: Service task logic defined with an expression.

properties.title: Delegate expression
properties.description: Service task logic defined with a delegate expression.

properties.title: Result variable name
properties.description: Process variable name to store the service task result.

properties.title: Class fields
properties.description: Field extensions

properties.title: Script format
properties.description: Script format of the script task.

properties.title: Script
properties.description: Script text of the script task.

properties.title: Class
properties.description: Class of the rule task.

properties.title: Input variables
properties.description: Input variables of the rule task.

properties.title: Result variable
properties.description: Result variable of the rule task.

properties.title: Rules
properties.description: Rules of the rule task.

properties.title: Exclude
properties.description: Use the rules property as exclusion.

properties.title: To
properties.description: The recipients if the e-mail. Multiple recipients are defined in a comma-separated list.

properties.title: From
properties.description: The sender e-mail address. If not provided, the default configured from address is used.

properties.title: Subject
properties.description: The subject of the e-mail.

properties.title: Cc
properties.description: The cc's of the e-mail. Multiple recipients are defined in a comma-separated list

properties.title: Bcc
properties.description: The bcc's of the e-mail. Multiple recipients are defined in a comma-separated list

properties.title: Text
properties.description: The content of the e-mail, in case one needs to send plain none-rich e-mails. Can be used in combination with html, for e-mail clients that don't support rich content. The client will then fall back to this text-only alternative.

properties.title: Html
properties.description: A piece of HTML that is the content of the e-mail.

properties.title: Charset
properties.description: Allows to change the charset of the email, which is necessary for many non-English languages.

properties.title: Called element
properties.description: Process reference.

properties.title: In parameters
properties.description: Definition of the input parameters

properties.title: Out parameters
properties.description: Definition of the output parameters

properties.title: Flow condition
properties.description: The condition of the sequence flow

properties.title: Default flow
properties.description: Define the sequence flow as default

properties.title: Conditional flow
properties.description: Define the sequence flow with a condition

properties.title: Time duration (e.g. PT5M)
properties.description: Define the timer with a ISO-8601 duration.

properties.title: Time date in ISO-8601
properties.description: Define the timer with a ISO-8601 date definition.

properties.title: Time cycle (e.g. R3/PT10H)
properties.description: Define the timer with a ISO-8601 cycle.

properties.title: Message reference
properties.description: Define the message name.

properties.title: Signal reference
properties.description: Define the signal name.

properties.title: Error reference
properties.description: Define the error name.

properties.title: Initiator
properties.description: Initiator of the process.

properties.title: Text
properties.description: The text of the text annotation.

properties.title: 异步任务(Asynchronous)
properties.description: 定义为一个异步任务.

properties.title: 互斥任务(Exclusive)
properties.description: 定义为一个互斥任务

properties.title: 执行监听器(Execution listeners)
properties.description: Listeners for an activity, process, sequence flow, start and end event.

properties.title: 自定义表单(Custom form)
properties.description: Des A

properties.title: 循环类型(Loop type)
properties.description: Repeated activity execution (parallel or sequential) can be displayed through different loop types

properties.title: 顺序(多实例)(Sequential (Multi-instance))
properties.description: Define the multi instance as sequential.

properties.title: 基数(多实力)Cardinality (Multi-instance)
properties.description: Define the cardinality of multi instance.

properties.title: 基数(多实例)(Collection (Multi-instance))
properties.description: Define the collection for the multi instance.

properties.title: 元素变量(多实例)Element variable (Multi-instance)
properties.description: Define the element variable for the multi instance.

properties.title: 完成条件(多实例)(Completion condition (Multi-instance))
properties.description: Define the completion condition for the multi instance.

properties.title: 是否为补偿(Is for compensation)
properties.description: 一个标志,标识是否这个活动的目的是为了补偿.

stencils.title: BPMN-Diagram
stencils.description: A BPMN 2.0 diagram.

stencils.title: 启动事件(Start event)
stencils.description: 启动没有一个特定的触发器事件

stencils.title: 启动定时事件(Start timer event)
stencils.description: 启动一个定时触发的事件

stencils.title: 启动消息事件(Start message event)
stencils.description: 启动一个消息触发的事件

stencils.title: 异常事件(Start error event)
stencils.description: 抛出BPMN异常的事件

stencils.title: 用户任务(User task)
stencils.description: 一个由特定用户完成的任务

stencils.title: 服务任务(Service task)
stencils.description: 一个由服务完成的自动任务

stencils.title: 脚本任务(Script task)
stencils.description: 一个由脚本完成的特定任务，支持js groovy

stencils.title: 规则任务(Business rule task)
stencils.description: 一个由自定义规则完成的任务

stencils.title: 接受任务(Receive task)
stencils.description: 一个等待信号的任务

stencils.title: 手工任务(Manual task)
stencils.description: 一个自动完成无逻辑的任务

stencils.title: 邮件任务(Mail task)
stencils.description: 一个发送邮件通知的任务

stencils.title: 子流程(Sub process)
stencils.description: 子流程范围

stencils.title: 事件子流程(Event sub process)
stencils.description: 一个事件周期的子流程

stencils.title: 调用活动(Call activity)
stencils.description: 一个调用活动

stencils.title: 互斥网关(Exclusive gateway)
stencils.description: 一个选择的网关

stencils.title: 并行网关(Parallel gateway)
stencils.description: 一个并行的网关

stencils.title: 包容性网关(Inclusive gateway)
stencils.description: 一个包容性网关

stencils.title: 事件网关(Event gateway)
stencils.description: 一个事件网关

stencils.title: 边界错误事件(Boundary error event)
stencils.description: 一个捕捉BPMN异常的边界事件

stencils.title: 定时边界事件(Boundary timer event)
stencils.description: 一个定时触发的边界事件

stencils.title: 边界信号事件(Boundary signal event)
stencils.description: 一个信号触发的边界事件

stencils.title: 中间定时器捕获事件(Intermediate timer catching event)
stencils.description: 定时器触发的中间捕获事件
groups: 中间捕获事件列表(Intermediate Catching Events)

stencils.title: 中间信号捕获事件(Intermediate signal catching event)
stencils.description: 信号触发的捕获事件
groups: 中间捕获事件列表(Intermediate Catching Events)

stencils.title: 中间消息捕获事件(Intermediate message catching event)
stencils.description: 一个消息触发的中间捕获事件
groups: 中间捕获事件列表(Intermediate Catching Events)

stencils.title: 中间抛出事件
stencils.description: 无触发器的中间抛出事件
groups: 中间抛出事件(Intermediate Throwing Events)

stencils.title: 信号中间抛出事件(Intermediate signal throwing event)
stencils.description: 一个信号触发的中间抛出事件
groups: 中间抛出事件(Intermediate Throwing Events)

stencils.title: 结束任务(End event)
stencils.description: 一个无触发器的结束任务

stencils.title: 结束错误任务(End error event)
stencils.description: 一个抛出错误事件的任务

stencils.title: 顺序流
stencils.description: 顺序流定义活动的执行顺序

stencils.title: 注释
stencils.description: 连接一个注释到指定元素

stencils.title: 文本注释(Text annotation)
stencils.description: 给指定元素添加文本注释
